modName: Wigs - so follwers can use KS Hairdos with HDT physics
summary: This mod allows followers and NPC’s to use Stealthic’s and Kalilies’ beautifully crafted KS Hairdos with HDT Physics by creating wigs.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#b6b6b6][color=#999999][size=3][color=#ffffff][size=6][color=#ff0000]WIGS[/color] - so followers can use KS Hairdos with HDT physics.[/size]

[/color]
[/size][/color][/color][color=#ffffff][size=3][color=#ff0000]DESCRIPTION:[/color] This mod allows followers and NPC’s to use Stealthic’s and Kalilies’ beautifully crafted KS Hairdos with HDT Physics by creating wigs. The “wigs” are essentially helmets that can be made at any forge under the “hide” category.  Since the wigs are helmets, they can be tempered and enchanted. Circlets may be worn with the wigs. There are 16 styles of KS Hairdo wigs. Each wig comes in black, blonde, brunette, chestnut and red (80 wigs in all).   If you use an outfit manager such as found with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/]Amazing Follower Tweaks [/url](AFT), you can assign a hairdo for each outfit.


[color=#ff0000]INSTALLATION:[/color] Use mod-manager or drop the esp and mesh files in your data folder.


[color=#ff0000]TO UNINSTALL:[/color] Use mod-manager or delete the “KS wigs” esp and the “KS wig” mesh files located at
Data/Meshes/Armor/Hide/f.

[/size][/color]
[color=#ff0000][size=3]TROUBLESHOOTING:[/size][/color][size=3][color=#ffffff][color=#999999]
[color=#ffffff]1. If your follower does not equip the wig, make sure there are no other helmets in the inventory that have a higher armor rating.
[/color]
[/color][/color][color=#ffffff]2. If the wig changes color, un-equip then re-equip the wig or remove the wig from the follower's inventory, exit out of the follower dialog, then replace the wig in the follower's inventory.  

[/color][color=#999999]
[/color][/size][color=#999999][color=#660000][size=3][color=#ff0000]REQUIREMENTS:[/color]
[b][color=#ffffff]1.[/color] [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70363/]KS Hairdos[b] - [/b]HDT Physics by Stealthic and Kalilies[/url]

[color=#ffffff]2. [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/]HDT Physics Extensions[/url]

[color=#ffffff]3. [/color][url=http://http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]

[/size][/color][/color][color=#b6b6b6]
[size=2][size=3][color=#ffffff][color=#ff0000]CREDITS:[/color]
1. Stealthic and Kalilies for their beautifully crafted KS Hairdos with HDT Physics

2. HydrogensaysHDT for HDT physics extension
[/color]
[color=#ffffff]3.[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71034/]Apogee777 and Suredude HDT Hair to Hair Helmet Tutorial[/url] 


[color=#ffffff][color=#ff0000]PERMISSION NOTES:[/color] Stealthic and Kalilies have given permission for use of their KS Hairdos with HDT physics for NPC and follower mods, but may request that this mod be removed at any time if they desire.[/color]
[/size][/size]
